author: Jorge
text:
Worst customer service ever

Sold items on Grailed for 3 years. More than 100 items sold and aprox 50 feedbacks after (ALL the feedbacks I received were 5*), my account was simply deleted or "Frozen". After one week not being able to reach the website (I thought the site was down), I found out a message on my email box saying "You're account was permanently frozen for selling not genuine products". I emailed them asking the reason behind that accusation and they just didn't give me one. Since than I send them 3 more emails about the subject trying to figure it out the reasons for this disclosure and I got zero answers. I'm really disappointed with Grailed and the way they treat their partners
title: Worst customer service ever

author: Andre Monteiro
text:
Just sold 2 items so far, 79 likes on one item for example, but no request. To high fees imo. 

Biggest con:
You create a nice description, invest time and effort, you choose "publish" button, then they review your item, and list it or JUST DELETE it. 
They want to have a prove younhave item in hands, but, first they dont mention before, second, which is worse, even if you upload a picture with item and a piece of paper with your username,still deleted....#nogo 
Wont use again, cause you have to choose and mention a lot of details to describe your item (takes like 10 minutes to create an offer), and then they might just delete it and ask you to create a new offer to your item.🤔
